Name: mucoepidermoid esophageal carcinoma
Definition: A breast carcinoma that represents a mixed group of malignant neoplasms characterized by the histologic presence of two or more cellular types.

Name: esophageal adenoid cystic carcinoma
Definition: An esophageal carcinoma that derives_from epithelial cells of the salivary gland.

Name: esophagus small cell carcinoma
Definition: A hematologic cancer that is located in the blood or bone marrow that doesn't respond to treatment.
